TUTORIAL_PREF Replay tutorial on next launch Registered since %1$s See (his/her) pictures profil_%d profil_big_%d Cannot load user information Cannot set profil picture Pictothemo\'s logo Loading User"s profil picture Comments count Positive votes count Negative votes count Indicator for picture of the day User\'s trophy Icone premiere utilisations 0 Navigateur Welcome to Pictothemo How it works Its interest Pictothemo is an app which highlight one member\'s image a day. This picture refers to a theme and had been elected picture of the day by the community. Every day you can vote for your favourite picture which will be elected the following day. You can also vote for the theme of two days later. You can choose to replace your wallpaper everyday by the winning picture in the parameters. You can also propose your image and try to unlock all the Pictothemo trophies.! LET\'S GO At any moment you will be able to replay this tutorial in the parameter center.
